title: Chapter 3008: Chapter 1562: In The Maddening Memories Of The Real And Fake World, Kui Named Six Xu Entrusts This Body_3
body:
Chapter 3008: Chapter 1562: In The Maddening Memories Of The Real And Fake World, Kui Named Six Xu Entrusts This Body_3

Chapter 3008: Chapter 1562: In the Maddening Memories of the Real and Fake World, Kui Named Six Xu Entrusts this Body_3

“`

That abomination could only be this guy, right?

“Let me go!!!”

Taizai Ci screamed in frenzy, vainly trying to shake the enormous container that imprisoned him.

Hua Kongque was silent for a long time before saying, “First, I want to make one thing clear, I don’t entirely agree with you.”

“I know.”

“Secondly, I want to say, I have come, but I will never be a part of the same faction as you, just as the Path of the Ancient Swordsman, ancient martial arts, spiritual array…I only ever draw references from them.”

“I know.”

“And finally, if possible, I would like to say one last thing, enough is enough, it’s time to stop.”

A surge of ecstasy erupted across Taizai Ci’s face.

Hallmaster Dao, you truly are my Hallmaster Dao!

I knew it, my loyalty was not misplaced, you can surely persuade this madman, right?

The tear-stained young man slowly shook his head, saying solemnly and sadly,

“Hallmaster Dao Qiongcang, as you know… this is far from sufficient.”

Hua Kongque dropped his head in despair, then quickly came to terms with it, shrugging with a chuckle,

“What should I say, I’m just higher void Xiaoxiao, and you, my demi-saint, your intentions, I have no power to stop.”

Thud!

Taizai Ci fell powerlessly to the bottom, met with an icy cold touch.

He found himself back inside the container, becoming that existence at the mercy of others.

No…

No!

No!!!

…

“Gurgle gurgle gurgle…”

After a jolt, the thick liquid inside the container began to swirl.

Taizai Ci contorted his face in agony, feeling a force piercing into his body and soul from all directions.

His consciousness began to blur, and the images before his eyes became chaotic.

“Boom…”

Taizai Ci saw a dingy sky, and a Sky-covering Nine-Tailed Giant looming down from the clouds, pinching a human between two fingers.

It tilted its head, one eye looking into the distance, the other eye drooping down on him. Suddenly, with a flick of its fingertip, the human was tossed into the giant’s mouth. With a thunderous clap, the lips closed, biting through this fantasy realm.

“No—”

Taizai Ci was on the brink of collapse.

Why was he having such a nightmare?

Was that human being thrown into its mouth him?

Where exactly was this place, and what was happening to the world?

“Gurgle gurgle gurgle…”

The sound of the swirling, invading liquid came again, and the voices of those two madmen re-emerged nearby:

“What is this, what liquid have you injected into him?”

“Kui.”

“Kui? The First Generation Six Xu?”

“Yes, A’Ci has the God of War Bloodline, his physique is strong, he will surely be able to withstand such brutal power, he will be fine, definitely.”

I’ll be fine, your ancestor!

Let me go, please let me go!

Who are you, who are you really, what is Kui, and what is the First Generation Six Xu?

Pain…

Such pain, ahhhhh—

“Boom!”

After a certain degree of excruciating pain, Taizai Ci’s mind shook violently, and hallucinations appeared again.

This time, he still saw the Nine-Tailed Giant.

Only this time, in the void in front of the giant’s feet, eleven orbs appeared.

The shadows of eleven struggling people trapped within the orbs, unleashing all their skills in desperation, were like drowning individuals sinking deeper and deeper.

“Who is it?”

“Who are you!”

Taizai Ci widened his eyes, trying hard to discern.

He looked left and right, up and down, nearly forcing his eyes to bulge out and burst, until he finally recognized who those eleven people were…

It was himself!

“Ah ah ah ah…”

Taizai Ci’s eyes bulged in madness, and he screamed hoarsely, feeling the white Sun replace his vision in a flash of brightness.

Then, another Taizai Ci leaped out from the ground, circling around the eleven orbs a few times before the blazing sun plummeted down, completely disintegrating him.

Death!

Death naturally meant the shattering of the fantasy realm.

“Gurgle gurgle gurgle…” But the sound of the swirling liquid came again, and the voices of those two madmen, too!

“You speak so definitively, but I dare not agree. I think, with what you’re doing, he might still have the chance to remember.”

“He won’t, A’Ci loves me, I can feel it.”

“He will, Haizi, trust me!”

“Why?”

“You’ve only had a brief encounter with Bazhun’an, while I, to study the Way of the Sword, have earnestly experienced his swordsmanship…Do you know the Fantasy Sword Technique?”

“Hmm.”

“Then you must have also heard about the Second World!”

“Hmm, what about it?”

“The Second World can fully unleash a person’s inner desires but can also fully unlock the most deeply sealed memories…Haizi, believe me, you cannot wrap fire with paper.”

“The Second World…”

“Yes!”

“Are there many who can do it?”

“Uh.”

“Ancient Sword Technique…Hallmaster Dao Qiongcang, do you think, if I invited Bazhun’an, he would come here?”

“Don’t even think about it, he won’t!”

“What if I got the family head to invite Yue Gongnu, to bring him here?”

“Uh…”

Damn it all!

Taizai Ci felt like he was about to explode.

He could no longer process the content of the conversation between those two madmen.

His vision alternated between the closed reality of the confined space and the fantasy realm of the giant space.

He couldn’t even consider which was reality and which was illusion.

“Roar—” A golden monster, one-legged, dragon-like and bull-like, suddenly invaded his mind, nearly equal to the Nine-Tailed Giant in stature.

“Hey? Are you not awake yet?” But in front of him, the Nine-Tailed Giant bent down to his face, waving at him.

“So, this is Kui…” Yet in his ears, there was still the unsettlingly calm dialogue of those two madmen, disregarding the life and death of others:

“Yes, Hallmaster Dao Qiongcang, the First Generation Six Xu are strong, every test subject is precious.”

“But didn’t you say that demi-saints are prone to losing control, and you’re not sure about it? What if he explodes…”

“There is always a need to try.”

“Fine, you still have Six Xu on hand?”

“Yes, I have my eye on a good prospect, a bit weak at the moment, but with a solid foundation.”

“Really?”

“You’ve been to Sacred Mountain Gui Zhe, you must know about the light of spiritual cultivation, right?”

“Elder Yan? Forget about it, you can’t touch Elder Yan, absolutely!”

“It’s not him I’m referring to; it’s someone else.”

“Who?”

“Someone opposing, with a dark attribute.”

“`
